pages.text: The heart of this frozen world.$(br2)$(bold)Entry Requirement:$()$(br)3 Ancient Gears are required to open the boss chamber.$(br2)Defeating $(l:chronodawn:bosses/clockwork_sentinel)Clockwork Sentinels$(/l) may yield these gears.$(br2)Inside awaits the $(l:chronodawn:bosses/time_tyrant)Time Tyrant$(/l), the final guardian of the Stasis Core.
